thread.section_title: Starway Boutique Tianan Rega Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location!
thread.title_full: Location, location! - Review of Starway Boutique Tianan Rega Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Will T
title: Location, location!
text:
This hotel is located only a few minutes walk from Wangfujing Street to the east and the Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square to the west.
The room, although small, was adequate; it was clean and quiet.
All the she staff, including the house keeping staff, were friendly and polite (a hullo and smiles go a long way).
I would definitely recommend this hotel for cleanliness and comfort; all in all excellent value given its location
Room Tip: Ask for a quiet room overlooking the Marriott Hotel complex See more room tips
